channel.title: CVE Feed for Kashipara Group -- Hotel Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kashipara Group -- Hotel Management

item.title: CVE-2023-49270|2024-08-27T15:03:03.587Z -- kashipara%20group -- hotel%20management
item.description: Hotel Management v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities. The 'check_in_date' parameter of the reservation.php resource is copied into the HTML document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the application's response.
